configurationItems.name: url
configurationItems.description: Define the URL of the service

configurationItems.name: certpath
configurationItems.description: Path to certificate file, in case of self-signed etc.

configurationItems.name: query_retry_wait
configurationItems.description: The amount of seconds to wait before trying to fetch the results.

configurationItems.name: recursive_sample_limit
configurationItems.description: The maximum amount of recursive samples which will be analyzed. 0 disables recursion.

configurationItems.name: reanalyze
configurationItems.description: If set to true, known samples will be re-analyzed on submission.

configurationItems.name: archive_password
configurationItems.description: The password that will be used to extract archives.

configurationItems.name: archive_compound_sample
configurationItems.description: If set to true, files inside archives are treated as a single, compound sample. Otherwise, each file is treated as its own sample.
